projects.title: Quick Quiz Dashboard
projects.description: Blueprinted a national compliance dashboard that turned seed-to-sale telemetry into regulator-ready intelligence.
projects.fullDescription: Partnered with Cannabis Canada to map legacy integrations, design a TypeScript/GraphQL service layer on AWS, and prototype policy dashboards. Documented data governance patterns and rollout phases so internal teams and provincial regulators shared a clear integration roadmap.

projects.title: Blockchain Summit
projects.description: Supported summit delivery with agile resource planning, stakeholder communication, and end-to-end coordination for a multi-speaker virtual event.
projects.fullDescription: Worked as a Project Management Intern for CareerIn's blockchain summit, coordinating resources across time zones, synchronising speaker logistics, and keeping stakeholders aligned from kickoff through the live event. Conducted weekly agile ceremonies, tracked risks, and ensured deliverables stayed on schedule while supporting marketing outreach that drove record attendance.

projects.title: Cannabis Canada Data Platform
projects.description: Blueprinted a national compliance dashboard that turned seed-to-sale telemetry into regulator-ready intelligence.
projects.fullDescription: Partnered with Cannabis Canada to map legacy integrations, design a TypeScript/GraphQL service layer on AWS, and prototype policy dashboards. Documented data governance patterns and rollout phases so internal teams and provincial regulators shared a clear integration roadmap.

projects.title: Learn@SLC Automation Audit
projects.description: Audited Learn@SLC's onboarding workflows and delivered an automation roadmap that removed manual bottlenecks.
projects.fullDescription: Mapped every touch point in the student journey, quantified failure modes, and prioritised fixes using RICE scoring. Prototyped Zapier and Make scenarios that synchronised Google Workspace, CRM, and payment data, cutting average onboarding time by 40%.
